name: Rock Fling
desc:
You conjure and then fling a rock of 10 pounds at a target creature within range. It must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 4d6 bludgeoning damage. If the creature is Medium size or smaller, they are also knocked prone.

If you are adjacent to a rock or similar earth object that weighs between 10 to 20 pounds, you can instead throw that object with this spell for 1 AP.
empower: Range increased to 300 feet. Creatures have advantage on their saving throw if you are targeting a creature farther than 90 feet.
author: CrusaderDroid
